details: Find the below List of Upcoming Apple Mobile Phones in India with other specifications, expert score, ratings and pictures. This list was last updated on 21st October 2023

The Sony A7C is undoubtedly an able performer, and will produce photos and videos that the majority of users will be happy with, despite limited video specs. The camera is slightly smaller and considerably lighter than standard A-series models but it lacks any standout features that capture the imagination.

In Bangladesh, Google is expected to release 26 upcoming/rumored devices. Among these upcoming models, there are 26 smartphones expected to launch in the next 3 months. These devices include the Google Pixel Fold 3
